profile_summary:
As a QA Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in implementing **automated testing frameworks** including **Playwright**, **Cypress**, and **Selenium** for robust quality assurance across healthcare and financial sectors. My strong expertise in **testing RESTful APIs** using **Postman**, **pytest**, and **Supertest** enhances application reliability. I integrate **CI/CD pipelines** into my workflow leveraging tools such as **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins** to automate the testing processes effectively. I possess a strategic approach to **test data management** and **environment configuration**, ensuring high standards of software integrity. 
In addition to my QA skills, I bring a solid foundation in development with **Python**, **JavaScript**, and **TypeScript**. My full-stack development experience includes building **ML-driven systems** and developing **data pipelines** underpinned by **event-driven architectures**. I am proficient in agile methodologies and possess strong communication skills, allowing me to collaborate effectively within cross-functional teams while adhering to compliance standards.
